titleStmt.title: The liar. Or, A contradiction to those who in the titles of their bookes affirmed them to be true, when they were false : although mine are all true, yet I terme them lyes. Veritas veritatis.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
